strategy_spec: name='Demo Momentum Strategy' description='A simple momentum-based trading strategy' version='1.0.0' universe=['AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT', 'AMZN', 'TSLA'] start_date=datetime.datetime(2024, 8, 23, 13, 41, 30, 71985) end_date=datetime.datetime(2025, 8, 23, 13, 41, 30, 71997) features=[FeatureSpec(name='price_momentum', feature_type=<FeatureType.PRICE_BASED: 'price_based'>, lookback_period=20, parameters={'method': 'returns'})] target=<TargetType.NEXT_DAY_RETURN: 'next_day_return'> target_lookback=1 entry_rules=EntryExitRule(condition='momentum > 0.02', lookback_period=20) exit_rules=EntryExitRule(condition='momentum < -0.01', lookback_period=10) holding_period=5 position_sizing=PositionSizing(method='fixed_size', volatility_target=None, risk_per_trade=None, max_position_size=0.2) max_positions=3 stop_loss=None take_profit=None cv_config=CrossValidationConfig(validation_type=<ValidationType.WALK_FORWARD: 'walk_forward'>, n_splits=5, train_size=0.7, purge_period=10, embargo_period=5) tags=[] author='Unknown' created_at=datetime.datetime(2025, 8, 23, 13, 41, 30, 72220)
